tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prasad and Dr Pratyusha are simply awesome people. Right from diagnosis to the completion of my treatment , they have just created a wow experience for me and my daughter

Dr Prasad is so easy with his craft. He puts you to ease at once and explains everything  with extreme clarity. He is relentless until his patient is 100% satisfied with the result . Kudos to his commitment to his profession . I will highly recommend him. 

Dr Pratyushas craft is like watching a genius at play. The way she connects with people , the care she shows towards patients, her ability to diagnose  and suggest the most accurate treatment for a patient- there is an absolute precision in the way she works. She is supremely patient and is so hardworking . God bless her for the person she is ! 

Their entire staff- is supremely efficient and work so well under both of their guidance. They are skilled , meticulous and put a patient at ease at once . Brilliant doctors and staff.

It is because of doctors like these medicine becomes so noble .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was a great experience. The staff was very knowledgeable, communicative and gave some very valuable advices, through out the treatment.

Dr. Prathyusha Prasad delivered more than she promised.

After struggling with my existing crowns for more than a year, I felt very confident about the treatment.

They were able to get the best job done in few days, which typically takes few months abroad with 10 percent of the cost.

I was treated with lasers, periodontist, endodontist and premium crowns.

Given a need I will 100 percent avail their facilities in future.

Highly recommended with out iota of doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Prathyusha Meka and Dr. Prasad Meka are both experts in this field and are very approachable. They make your inhibitions disappear with their kind and friendly nature.  The whole process of having my crowns was well laid out and executed with the latest medical instruments and machinery.  I can't thank them enough for my new natural smile that I am flaunting.  

I would also like to mention that all the other doctors and support staff were very courteous and helpful. 

Shilpa :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Prasad and Dr Pratusha are very skilful, ************* *** compassionate doctors. They also have a very dedicated team in place.My family members and I have been  visiting the Clinc for the past 10 years. We are extremely happy with the treatment provided and personal attention given.

context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Hi friends am karthik reddy.am 19 years old and I ad problem with my tooth.I have visited Kim's dental in secunderbad.Doctors have explained my problem clearly and adviced me to go for a scan. Doctors have advised for implants and crowns. My treatment was done best with best price.thank you Dr.prasad and Dr.prathyusha.

Doctors are very good with the patients. Diagnosis very good. Kim's dental have advance machine. Good medicine and doctors have taken good care for the patient. I suggest everyone to come Kim's dental. Am very thankful to Dr.Prathyusha  and I hope doctor visit my country.

We came from Andhra pradesh to Hyderabad to get my wife treatment done in kims dental. I have heard from many people about kims dental. Its really very good hospital. Doctors care the patient and also give a clear explanation on each and everything thank you.

Hi myself Tahera Tabessum. Had pain in my tooth. I have visited Kims dental secunderbad. Staffs and doctors are friendly.They was good treatment done for me. Clinic was clean and neat.friendly and polite is very imp to cure the patients. Thank you......

I visited 3 dental clinic. But the best is Kims dental. I visted Anusha dental clinic in Krishna nagar, where I had a very bad treatment.There have not done my root canal properly. Where as in kims doctors have have treated well and done the root canal properly am satisfied. Best doctors. Thank you.
